Segment.name: BFR
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of a planning schedule transaction set; whether a ship or delivery based forecast; and related forecast envelope dates

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ReleaseNumber
Field.comment: Number identifying a release against a Purchase Order previously placed by the parties involved in the transaction

Field.name: ScheduleTypeQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of dates used when defining a shipping or delivery time in a schedule or forecast

Field.name: ScheduleQuantityQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of quantities used when defining a schedule or forecast

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date3
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date4
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: PurchaseOrderNumber
Field.comment: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

Field.name: PlanningScheduleTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of planning schedule used

SyntaxNote.name: R0203
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of BFR02 or BFR03 is required.
